Message.Msg: Civilian Labor Force: Employment: Nov. 2000 141,136K 135,478K Nov. 2008 154,616K(+13.5M) 144,144K(+8.7M) Nov. 2012 155,291K(+.7M) 143,262K(-.9M) Civilian Labor Force grew dismal .7M and employment shrumk almost a million in 4 years.
